entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a character in the story who is trying to reach the green potion. He raises his wand and conjures a crystal goblet out of nowhere.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a character in the story who is reacting to Dumbledore's plan to drink the green potion.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: Lord Voldemort is mentioned as someone who would not want to kill the person who reached the island.

entities.name: green potion
entities.description: The green potion is a mysterious object that cannot be penetrated or changed in nature. Dumbledore thinks it can only be drunk.

entities.name: crystal goblet
entities.description: Dumbledore conjures a crystal goblet out of nowhere to drink the green potion.

entities.name: island
entities.description: The island is mentioned as a place that can be reached by someone who drinks the green potion.
